sqlMap.select:
SELECT NOU_YMD, RG, BIN_NO, NOU_TIM, JUCHU_KB, TUIKA_FG, NOUJOU_FG, HAKO_YMD,HIKI_FG, HIKIYOKUSI_FG, SIJI_HAKO, (SIJI_HAKO - HIKI_HAKO) FUSOKU_HAKO, JUNBI_HAKO, SEKI_VOL ,IJOU_KB FROM TB_NOUBIN_JO
WHERE 0=0
AND RG LIKE '$rg$%'
ORDER BY NOU_YMD ,RG ,BIN_NO ,NOU_TIM
ORDER BY NOU_YMD ,NOU_TIM ,RG ,BIN_NO
